sn2.30:1.3: sahali → sahalī (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed) | nīko → niṅko (bj, pts1ed); niko (sya-all, km, pts2ed) | vegabbhari ca → veṭambarī ca (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
sn2.30:4.4: Na hi nūna tādisaṁ karoti → naha nūna tādī pakaroti (bj, cck, sya1ed, km, pts2ed); nahi nūna tādī pakaroti (sya2ed)
sn2.30:10.1: Sahācaritena → sahāravenāpi (bj, pts2ed); saha racitena (sya-all); sagāravenāpi (pts1ed) | sigālo → siṅgālo (mr)
sn2.30:17.2: nakkhattānaṁva candimā → nakkhattānañca candimā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
